description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Gift Brownie Squares recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Gift Brownie Squares Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Betty Crocker triple chocolate brownie mix
1 drop Queen Green Food Colour (to tint)
1 handful Dollar Sweets 100s & 1000s (red white and green) (to decorate)
1 drop Queen Red Food Colour Gel (to decorate)

recipeInstructions.text: Make brownies according to packet instructions, using butter and eggs. Cool in pan for 1 hour, then freeze for 30 minutes. Remove brownies from pan and cut into 16 squares, trimming sides if desired.

Place vanilla frosting in a bowl. Tint green with food gel. Spread frosting over brownies. Scatter over sprinkles. Pipe a red cross over frosting with food gel. Arrange 5 chocolate buttons in a circle in the centre of each brownie to represent a bow. Serve.
